statements: UPDATE vpn_connection_logs SET disconnect_time = '2022-02-28 10:30:00' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE vpn_logs SET connection_duration = 3600 WHERE log_id = 1234

UPDATE vpn_logs SET server_ip = '203.0.113.10', connection_duration = 600 WHERE user_id = 123 AND vpn_protocol = 'OpenVPN';
UPDATE security_incidents SET investigation_status = 'Closed', response_action = 'Review incident report' WHERE incident_type = 'Unauthorized Access' AND incident_id = 456;
UPDATE vpn_connections SET connection_status='connected' WHERE user_id=1001;

UPDATE vpn_users SET last_login = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = 'dcf4f8b8-63e0-4ea6-a013-93cd6a70d0bd';
